hero.subtitle: Comprehensive Static Application Security Testing for Safer, Stronger Code

whySastify.title: Why Use SASTify ?
whySastify.subtitle: The Fastest Way to Find, Fix & Prevent Vulnerabilities.
whySastify.description: Unlock advanced, automated security testing built for modern developers.

detection.title: Comprehensive Vulnerability Detection
detection.description: Automatically identify security vulnerabilities in your source code across multiple programming languages and frameworks. SASTify scans your codebase thoroughly to ensure no security issue goes unnoticed

scanning.title: Fast and Accurate Scanning
scanning.description: Experience lightning-fast analysis with precision. SASTify's advanced algorithms minimize false positives, providing you with accurate results to focus on what truly matters.

dashboard.title: User-Friendly Dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor your code's security status with an intuitive and easy-to-navigate dashboard. View detailed reports, track vulnerabilities, and take immediate action, all from one central location.

reporting.title: Detailed Reporting and Insights
reporting.description: Gain deep insights into your code's security with comprehensive reports. SASTify provides actionable recommendations to fix vulnerabilities, helping you maintain a strong security posture.

upload.title: Upload Your Code File
upload.description: Quickly upload your project files - drag & drop or select from your device. SASTify supports multiple languages and file types.

configure.title: Configure Your Scans
configure.description: Set your scan rules, choose the scope, and define the languages or frameworks you want analyzed.

scan.title: Automated Code Scanning
scan.description: SASTify instantly analyzes your entire codebase for vulnerabilities, insecure patterns, and potential risks - all automatically.

reports.title: Get Detailed Reports
reports.description: Receive a clear, structured report with severity levels, affected lines, and actionable recommendations.

fix.title: Fix & Track Progress
fix.description: Use the dashboard to remediate issues, assign tasks to teammates, and monitor fixes in real time.

track.title: Track Progress in Dashboard
track.description: Get a clear overview of progress, identify patterns, and make informed decisions using real-time dashboard insights.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Improvement Suggestions
aiPowered.description: Our integrated AI doesn't just find vulnerabilities — it suggests how to fix them. Get intelligent, actionable recommendations tailored to your code to improve quality and security faster.

learningPlatforms.title: Level Up Your Secure Coding Skills
learningPlatforms.subtitle: SASTify gives developers more than security tools - it empowers them to learn, experiment, and grow. From guided lessons to real-world exploit scenarios, our learning ecosystem helps you understand vulnerabilities deeply and master how to fix them with confidence.

cylearn.title: CyLearn Educational Platform - Learn by Doing
cylearn.description: A structured, hands-on learning hub packed with tutorials, guided labs, and interactive exercises that teach how vulnerabilities work from the inside out.
cylearn.subtitle: Improve your skills

vulnplayground.title: VulnPlayground - Learn by Breaking
vulnplayground.description: A safe sandbox to experiment with intentionally vulnerable code, understand real flaws, and learn to fix them by practicing on real-world scenarios.
vulnplayground.subtitle: Break to learn
